```{r user defined settings}
herbarium_code <- ''
project_code <- ''
p2d_proj <- ''
p2d_spec <- ''
```

```{r load data}
herbarium <- herbaria_info |> 
  dplyr::filter(Abbrevation == herbarium_code)

project <- read.csv(p2d_proj) |> 
  filter(Project == project_code)

specimens <- read.csv(p2d_spec) |>
  dplyr::mutate(Coll = paste(Primary_Collector, Collection_number)) |>
  dplyr::select(Taxon = Coll, Collection = Full_name) 
```

Dear `r herbarium$Contact`

We at `r project$Organization` are transferring these materials to `r herbarium$Name` to serve as vouchers for the `r project$Name` project. 

This package contains the specimens noted on the next page, and labels for them in a manila envelope.

Thank you, we appreciate your assistance in this matter. Please do not hesitate to reach out to me with any questions. 

Sincerely,

`r project$Person`, 
`r project$Phone`
`r project$Email`

```{r Specimen table}
knitr::kable(specimens) |>
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header"))
```

```{r clean environment}
rm(herbarium_code, project_code, herbarium, project, specimens)
```
